examples.text: Her tavuk yediğimde nedense bana dokunuyor.
examples.translation: For some reason, every time I eat chicken, it upsets my stomach.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish هر, from Persian هر (har). Cognate with Bengali হর (hor, “every”), Latin salvus (“safe, whole”), Ancient Greek ὅλος (hólos, “complete, whole”). Doublet of salvo.
